definition: a farm tool having one or more heavy blades to break the soil and cut a furrow prior to sowing, act on verbally or in some form of artistic expression
details:
noun
- a farm tool having one or more heavy blades to break the soil and cut a furrow prior to sowing
= synonyms: plough
verb
- act on verbally or in some form of artistic expression
= synonyms: cover
- to break and turn over earth especially with a plow
= example: to break and turn over earth especially with a plow
= synonyms: turn
- move in a way resembling that of a plow cutting into or going through the soil
= example: move in a way resembling that of a plow cutting into or going through the soil
= synonyms: plough
